description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Support.Item.NKgFIZQYkL3bb6xn]{Riding Tarantula Support Benefit}

If you hit and deal damage to a creature your riding tarantula threatens, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] whenever it takes a concentrate action or that action is lost.

rules.text: If you hit and deal damage to a creature your riding tarantula threatens, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] whenever it takes a concentrate action or that action is lost. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.6PFleA0i6lxly55o]{Effect: Riding Tarantula Support Benefit (Penalty)}
